packagegui.title: SquidGuard Proxy Filter: XMLRPC Sync

field.description:
Select a sync method for SquidGuard.

Important: While using "Sync to host(s) defined below", only sync from host A to B, A to C but do not enable XMLRPC sync to A. This will result in a loop!

option.name: Sync to configured system backup server
Do not sync this package configuration
